com.volmit.catalyst.api

Interface PacketListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CatalystHost

    public interface PacketListener
    Hosts a packet listener
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGlobalIncomingListener(PacketHandler<?> handler)
      Add a packet listener for incoming packets (client -> server)
      void addGlobalOutgoingListener(PacketHandler<?> handler)
      Add a packet listener for outgoing packets (server -> client)
      <T> void addIncomingListener(Class<? extends T> packetType, PacketHandler<T> handler)
      Add a packet listener for incoming packets (client -> server)
      <T> void addOutgoingListener(Class<? extends T> packetType, PacketHandler<T> handler)
      Add a packet listener for outgoing packets (server -> client)
      void closeListener()
      Close the packet listener
      void onOpened()
      Called when the packet listener is opened
      void openListener()
      Start listening for packets
      void removeIncomingPacketListeners()
      Remove all incoming packet listeners

    • Method Detail

      • onOpened

        void onOpened()
        Called when the packet listener is opened

      • openListener

        void openListener()
        Start listening for packets

      • closeListener

        void closeListener()
        Close the packet listener

      • addOutgoingListener

        <T> void addOutgoingListener(Class<? extends T> packetType,
                             PacketHandler<T> handler)
        Add a packet listener for outgoing packets (server -> client)
        Parameters:
        packetType - the packet type
        handler - the handler. The return value denotes weather or not to send the packet to the player or not. Returning true sends the packet, false cancels it.

      • addGlobalOutgoingListener

        void addGlobalOutgoingListener(PacketHandler<?> handler)
        Add a packet listener for outgoing packets (server -> client)
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler. The return value denotes weather or not to send the packet to the player or not. Returning true sends the packet, false cancels it.

      • addIncomingListener

        <T> void addIncomingListener(Class<? extends T> packetType,
                             PacketHandler<T> handler)
        Add a packet listener for incoming packets (client -> server)
        Parameters:
        packetType - the packet type
        handler - the handler. The return value denotes weather or not to send the packet to the server (handled by craftbukkit) or not. Returning true sends the packet, false cancels it.

      • addGlobalIncomingListener

        void addGlobalIncomingListener(PacketHandler<?> handler)
        Add a packet listener for incoming packets (client -> server)
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler. The return value denotes weather or not to send the packet to the server (handled by craftbukkit) or not. Returning true sends the packet, false cancels it.

      • removeOutgoingPacketListeners

        void removeOutgoingPacketListeners(Class<?> c)
        Remove all outgoing listeners for the given packet type
        Parameters:
        c - the packet class

      • removeOutgoingPacketListeners

        void removeOutgoingPacketListeners()
        Remove all outgoing packet listeners

      • removeIncomingPacketListeners

        void removeIncomingPacketListeners(Class<?> c)
        Remove all incoming listeners for the given packet type
        Parameters:
        c - the packet class

      • removeIncomingPacketListeners

        void removeIncomingPacketListeners()
        Remove all incoming packet listeners
